name: Peaks of Yore DEMO
description:
PEAKS OF YORE

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

A peak-bagging adventure, set in the late 19th century. 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

DESCRIPTION

Travel around the region to climb challenging peaks while logging progress in your peak journal and take in the picturesque views of nature, rendered in the style of turn-of-the-century mountaineering photos.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

TWITTER : @andosdev

DEVLOG  :  forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=68652.0

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

DEMO

This is a Demo of the game that is slightly jam-packed with the core features that I want to get across. The demo was supposed to be shown at Norwich Games Festival, but due to the festival's cancellation, I am just putting the demo out publicly now.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CONTROLS

Move . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . WASD

Look . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  Mouse

Left Click . . . . . . . . . . .  Interact / Left Hand

Right Click . . . . . . . . . . Right Hand

Space . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Jump / Pull-up

Menu . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Escape

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Feel free to leave any suggestions or comments, and thanks for playing!
